articles.author: Rima Sabina Aouf
articles.title: ESA develops Lego brick from space dust to build on the moon - Dezeen
articles.description: The European Space Agency has created its own version of a Lego brick that is 3D printed from meteorite dust, as the organisation explores how to construct buildings in space.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency has created its own version of a Lego brick that is 3D printed from meteorite dust, as the organisation explores how to construct buildings in space.
